column4: hi all, ubuntu newbie here...anyone willing to help me out installing some software
ask. if we can help, we will :)
I would recommend re-installing the ubuntu version, then if you really want to upgrade it to the latest version, follow the guide at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/FirefoxNewVersion
you can reinstall the ubuntu one with "sudo apt-get install --reinstall firefox" or use synaptic
